snippet: The Roosevelt Institute’s president calls Mr. Trump’s plan “the same old failed ‘trickle-down’ economics”; another reader discusses repeal of the estate tax....
lead_paragraph: The Roosevelt Institute’s president calls Mr. Trump’s plan “the same old failed ‘trickle-down’ economics”; another reader discusses repeal of the estate tax.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Tax-Cut Plan: A Boon for the Wealthy
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Tax-Cut Plan: A Boon for the Wealthy
